history.narrative: Law 18-194, the “Stimulus Accountability Act of 2010”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 18-350, which was referred to the Committee on Housing Safety and Workforce Development. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on April 20, 2010, and May 4, 2010, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on May 19, 2010, it was assigned Act No. 18-405 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 18-194 became effective on July 23, 2010.
